description.p: Get the difference in years between two dates.

prototypes.prototype: YearsBetweenDates as N (Date1 as D, Date2 as D)

description.p: Returns the difference in years between two dates.

discussion.p: The YearsBetweenDates function computes the difference in years between two dates.

example.caption: YearsBetweenDates() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 OrderDate, CurrentDate() AS Now, YearsBetweenDates(OrderDate, CurrentDate()) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =08/04/1994 12:00:00 00 am|10/10/2019 12:00:00 00 am|25
